Ihe na egbochi ihe eriri  bụ ụdị ọgwụ ndị na-egbochi fibrinolysis
Ihe atụ gụnyere aminocaproic acid (ε-aminocaproic acid) na tranexamic acid

Ọgwụ ndị a yiri lysine na-egbochi mmepụta nke fibroid site na plasminogen ya site na plasmenogen activators (nke bụ isi t-PA na u-PA) nke na-ewere ọnọdụ karịsịa na mpaghara ndị nwere lysine n'elu fibrin.

Ihe atụ ọzọ ana akpọ protinin , bụ ihe na-egbochi protis  dị iche iche na-eme n'okike; mba ụfọdụ jụrụ ịnakwere ọgwụ a n'ihi na a na-eche na ọ nwere ọnụọgụ ọnwụ karịa ndị ọzọ (tranexsmic acid na aminocaproic acid) ma na-emebi akụrụ na obi. A na-ekwenye n'ọtụtụ ebe na aga-ebelata iji aprotinin eme ihe n'ihi nchegbu ndị a.
